query: How should digital radiography records be stored and referenced in an inspection report per AWS D1.1:2025 Clause 8.17.21?
expected_answer: Digital images must be archived with metadata (exposure parameters, IQI results) and unique identifiers linked to weld records
rationale: Clause 8.17.21 in D1.1:2025 specifies requirements for digital RT record retention, including mandatory metadata fields (exposure parameters, IQI identification, spatial calibration), file format standards (DICONDE), and archival procedures ensuring long-term retrievability for code audits and forensic investigations.

citations.excerpt: Digital radiography records â€” metadata requirements and archival standards
